topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53dd663363687271cd490000#post_53dd663363687271cd490000
When you get a chance see it, its good pulpy scifi fun.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53dd65c66368726f065a0000#post_53dd65c66368726f065a0000
I can't wait for it to come out on DVD, there was plenty of subtler nods to more obscure marvel properties and also a Lloyd Kauffman cameo.

For those who don't know, Kauffman is the head of Troma films, creator of such classics as The Toxic Avenger, Tromeo and Juliet, Sgt. Kabuki Man: NYPD, Class of Nuke Em High and Poultrygeist. James Gunn is a Troma alumnus, and wrote Tromeo and Juliet.

topics.body:
Stupid question time: why is it that whenever you catch someone lying or such a lot of people go "you don't know that!"

What I mean by this is that whenever someone says the phrase "you don't know that" it's suspicious as fuck.  What I mean by this is imagine if a police officer was asking you if you had any drugs on you and you did have it on you; saying the phrase "you don't know that" would be probably wind up with you getting a cavity search extremely fucking fast cause of how suspicious this phrase is.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
